title: Client window's resize needs to be a thing before release.
body:
On certain resolutions, the client's window is just too small for me, the font is hella small too I need to close my eyes in order to read it properly which is not a thing I'm supposed to do in order to read the chat or the menus...
Yes, there are certain 3rd party applications to magnify the client but, If I'm not mistaken, I think the idea is to release a client that can be used without the need of 3rd party software.
So, why are you so hesitant to implement 
However, I wont be surprised if the final version wont have a resize option, it's clear that Riot doesnt even consider people with poor vision on their design department. I mean, the minimap used to be a lot bigger in S1-S2 too and they just kept making it smaller over time (On high resolutions it's just ridiculously small).

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=jsgnextortex,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=fbKhLOv7,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-16T14:10:35.563+0000)
>
> On certain resolutions, the client&#039;s window is just too small for me, the font is hella small

We thought we fixed this sort of thing, but in some screens the client is not scaling as we expected it. We are currently investigating.

> ...a resize option...

To clarify, resizing and scaling are different things.

There are no plans to support resizing, i.e. modify the window ratio in any way.

Scaling to the proper size for different screen resolutions is something that we know the client must do well.
Are there plans to support manual rescaling, so change the window size manually without changing the ratio?

This is exactly what we are investigating right now. We are trying to determine if we are able to scale the window without changing the aspect ratio of the client so we do not have to change the layout of screens. Things are hopeful right now but we want to make sure we don't hurt the experience of legibility and performance for the client. No date yet but keep an eye out for updates!

I believe that they notified us about that in an earlier post that it's definitely a work-in-progress.
Not sure about when, but it's most likely going to be before release.

The client is still quite a ways off from release. They will probably add the window resizing in the polish phase. That will be after they implement everything, like all of the queues and lobbies for RGM, CoOp, Customs, hextech crafting etc.
Do you know if we will get a fullscreen option in the new client?
It would be really nice, but nothing has been said about it AFAIK.
